attributes.action: Stop SOCA from seizing legal goods & destroying them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call on the minister to urgently investigate The Serious Organised Crimes Agency (SOCA). With a view to:
• Stop them seizing food ingredients & chemicals by misusing the law. 
• To stop them illegally destroying such goods. 
• To pay such legal owner full compensation & for loss of profits. 
• To Discipline & or bring legal proceeding against any officers involved. 
• To hold a full public inquiry into these practices.

  The SOCA are operating an illegal / questionable policy import controls by seizing legal food ingredients & chemicals either while they are being legally imported . Also from the owners premises. They are misusing the law by:
• Misusing The police & evidence Act 1984,  S.18 & S.19
• Misusing court warrants. 
• Stopping the IPCC investigation of disciplinary complaints against SOCA officers. 
• Stopping the IPCC investigation of offences committed by SOCA officers
